main_definition: to be close to in distance or time

meanings_and_examples.definition: to have a small physical distance between objects
meanings_and_examples.example: The grocery store is near my house.

meanings_and_examples.definition: in close proximity to an event or location happening soon
meanings_and_examples.example: I will be there in time for the concert, it's only a few minutes from now.

meanings_and_examples.definition: to have a similar idea or concept without being identical
meanings_and_examples.example: His solution is near to mine but not exactly the same.

meanings_and_examples.definition: to be in close relation or connection with someone/something
meanings_and_examples.example: I am very close friends with her since childhood.

meanings_and_examples.definition: to approach something slowly and steadily
meanings_and_examples.example: The train near the station started moving as we entered it.
